text: Leonid Vladimirovich Bartenyev () (10 October 1933 – 17 November 2021) was a Soviet athlete. He competed mainly in the 100 metres. Bartenyev was born in Poltava, Ukraine. He competed for the USSR in the 1956 Summer Olympics, where he won the silver medal. He also went to the 1960 Summer Olympics, where he won another silver medal. Bartenyev died on 17 November 2021 in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 88.Умер двукратный призер Олимпийских игр Леонид Бартенев ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ukrainian athletes Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet sprinters
title: Leonid Bartenyev
